divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: I m not sure what exactly I just saw. I was driving home from a friends house, maybe 20 minutes ago, about 9:30 EST. I was stuck in traffic and I looked into the sky above. In the sky, coming fast from the west was a strange sight. It looked like 4 craft in the air, unlike anything I d seen before. They flew in a formation, but it was easy to see 4 distinct shapes. The had lights on them. 2 of the lights were flashing multicolored, the other 2 were bright white. As they made there way across the sky, I heard a sound that went like "loooooooo" It doesn t seem like anything of a human convention, but it might be some military thing. I am vetry shook up now though, so I decided to report thjis in, in case it is something more. -Jamal Bradford Miami FL
